title: (x) human - custom designed by WWFT {iota}
content: Can any one tell me what font this is.?? ![font image](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15804.jpg)
author: ross1972

comments.content: I think its handdrawn / 'just' a logotype, so, no 'real' font has been harmed here.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

its a weworkforthem job.   
   
go here:   
   
 [http://www.weworkforthem.com/wwft.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000348/http:/www.weworkforthem.com/wwft.html)   
   
click "trademarks", then "human".   
   
i had a look in their list of typefaces, its not there, so it looks like it was designed just for the logotype.
